submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        res = [0] * (k + 2)
        i, j = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while i < j:
            cur = abs(nums[i] - nums[j])
            mx = max(k - min(nums[i], nums[j]), max(nums[i], nums[j])- 0)
            res[0] += 1
            res[mx + 1] += 1
            res[cur] -= 1
            res[cur + 1] += 1
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        # print(res)
        ans = list(accumulate(res))
        # print(ans)
        return min(ans)
